# MLBoundingBoxUnits.pixel

**Case**

A unit of measurement in pixels for an image.

## Declaration

```swift
case pixel
```

## Designating units

- **MLBoundingBoxUnits.normalized**: A unit of measurement as a portion of an image’s overall width or height.
